text: Valeri Vladimirovich Kleymyonov (; born 18 December 1975) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC SKA Rostov-on-Don players Category:FC Energiya Volzhsky players Category:FC Lada Togliatti players Category:FC Mordovia Saransk players Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:FC Orenburg players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football forwards
title: Valeri Kleymyonov (footballer, born 1975)
